## Quick Actions

```bash
# Update this map
./update_project_map.sh

# Find misplaced files
find lib/ -name '*_bloc.dart' | grep -v '/bloc/'
find lib/ -name '*_screen.dart' | grep -v '/screens/'

# Validate structure
flutter analyze && flutter test
```
